description:
Hokuto learns about the No. 1 Boss Tournament from his lackey, because he doesn`t have any friends. And what`s that lackey`s name, anyway?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment fut désigné le candidat de Cromartie pour le championnat des boss de lycée
YoU KNoW MY NAME / 日本番長選手権
You Know My Name / Japan Boss Championship
You Know My Name / Nihon Banchou Senshuken
